summary: An email from an individual offering information about Jeffrey Epstein, claiming he was mentioned as her financial advisor prior to 1991 and that she knows a woman named Starr Maxwell, whose husband is a pilot named 'Max' with a British accent.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the case the email writer wishes to discuss; claimed to have been mentioned as the writer's financial advisor prior to 1991.

persons.name: Starr Maxwell
persons.context: A woman the email writer has known since age 10; mentioned in connection with the writer's offer of information about the Epstein case.

persons.name: Max
persons.context: The husband of Starr Maxwell, described as a pilot who goes by 'Max' and has a British accent.

connections.description: The email writer connects them by offering information about both in the context of the Epstein case, though no direct relationship between Epstein and Maxwell is stated.
Described as married; Max is Starr Maxwell's husband.

events.title: Epstein mentioned as financial advisor
events.description: Prior to 1991, the email writer's first husband mentioned Jeffrey Epstein as her financial advisor.

events.title: Information offer email sent
events.description: An individual sends an email offering to share information and memories related to Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: The writer claims Jeffrey Epstein was mentioned as her financial advisor by her first husband prior to 1991.
The writer states she has known a woman named Starr Maxwell since she was 10 years old.
Starr Maxwell is married to a pilot who goes by 'Max' and has a British accent.
The document is an email from January 2020 offering to provide information about the Jeffrey Epstein case.
